text: Nihsansaya, allahacya javala dina (dharma) kevala islamaca ahe.1 (Allahakarita paripurna atmasamarpana) ani jyanna grantha dila gela, tyanni jnana ye'una pohocalyanantara apasatila dvesa-matsaramule matabheda kela ani jo allahacya ayatinna (pavitra kura'anala) na manela tara allaha lavakaraca hisoba ghe'ila
